title: Emerald and Diamond Peacock Haaram - Padakam Design
features: This exquisite haaram features three strands of meticulously strung emerald beads, interspersed with diamond-studded gold spacers. The pendant, a traditional 'padakam', showcases a graceful peacock motif ('Mayura' design) crafted in intricate filigree gold and encrusted with sparkling diamonds. Seven emerald tear drops hang elegantly below the pendant, each framed by a halo of diamonds. The back of the pendant features a delicate Nakshi work design.
occasions: or any grand celebration. A statement piece for the modern bride with a love for tradition.
description: A magnificent blend of tradition and luxury. The peacock motif symbolizes beauty and prosperity, making this haaram an auspicious choice for milestone occasions. The high-quality emeralds and diamonds guarantee lasting brilliance, while the skilled craftsmanship ensures heirloom quality. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, warm luster that complements both traditional and contemporary attire.
